name: Swinub
flavorText:
It rubs its snout
on the ground to
find and dig up food. It sometimes
discovers hot
springs.

previous.name: Magcargo
previous.flavorText:
The shell on its
back is just skin
that has cooled and hardened. It
breaks easily with
a slight touch.

next.name: Piloswine
next.flavorText:
Because the long
hair all over its
body obscures its sight, it just
keeps charging
repeatedly.

pokemon.name: Mamoswine
pokemon.flavorText:
Its impressive tusks are made of
ice. The population thinned when it
turned warm after the ice age.
